Me and Jack met on the North Shore, O'ahu last year.
And I kinda was like, a little hesitant at first...
...because I just never thought I would date a pro surfer.
He's so supportive in all, my job, stuff.
He's just the greatest, he's so sweet and just a really good guy.
We both love to just surf and be active and healthy,...
...just kind of, I don't know, just goof around and just have fun.
It's almost like I feel bad while surfing 'cause he's so good.
